item.title: Mary Tyler Moore Tossed This Hat. Where Will It Land?
item.description: Hidden out of sight for decades, Mary Tyler Moore’s piece of television history seeks a permanent home.

item.title: Bronx Building Partially Collapses in Public Housing Complex
item.description: Fire officials said an incinerator shaft in the Alexander Avenue building had fallen in after reports of an explosion. There were no reports of injuri...

item.title: Moscow Indicates Retaliation if Europe Uses Russian Assets for Ukraine
item.description: Amid a plan to lend $165 billion to Kyiv using Russian state assets, European officials are mindful of the possibility of blowback as they gather to d...

item.title: After Kirk’s Death, Turning Point Vows to Go On. That May Be Easier Said Than Done.
item.description: Despite a surge in new campus chapters, there is a void left by Charlie Kirk’s murder that has implications for the entire MAGA movement.

item.title: The $400 Million Restaurant Man
item.description: Stephen Starr has become one of America’s most successful restaurateurs, making and replicating dining magic at places like Pastis and Osteria Mozza.
